attributes.action: When a sex offender is sentenced it should be life not limited years
attributes.background: Help me take this to the parliament!! Every time a sex offender creates a sex offence they should get life in prison not " life" which is only limited years. They should be made to serve their time.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
